20101222140657.000|20101222140658.000|CC1|YOU'RE LIVE OUT OF FLINTRIDGE.  
20101222140658.000|20101222140700.000|CC1|>> Reporter:  YEAH, WE'RE       
20101222140700.000|20101222140701.000|CC1|CALLING IT EVACUATION FATIGUE.

20101222141938.000|20101222141939.000|CC1|THEIR LIVES TO DEFEND.          
20101222141939.000|20101222141941.000|CC1|NO LONGER WITH OUR COUNTRY BE   
20101222141941.000|20101222141943.000|CC1|DENIED THE SERVICE OF THOUSANDS 
20101222141943.000|20101222141944.000|CC1|OF PATRIOTIC AMERICANS WHO WERE 
20101222141944.000|20101222141947.000|CC1|FORCE TO LEAVE THE MILITARY,    
20101222141947.000|20101222141949.000|CC1|REGARDLESS OF THEIR SKILLS, NO  
20101222141949.000|20101222141950.000|CC1|MATTER THEIR BRAVELY OR THEIR   
20101222141950.000|20101222141953.000|CC1|ZEAL, NO MATTER THEIR YEARS OF  
20101222141953.000|20101222141954.000|CC1|EXEMPLARY PERFORMANCE BECAUSE   
20101222141954.000|20101222141957.000|CC1|THEY HAPPEN TO BE GAY.          
20101222141957.000|20101222141958.000|CC1|NO LONGER WILL TENS OF          
20101222141958.000|20101222142000.000|CC1|THOUSANDS OF AMERICANS IN       
20101222142000.000|20101222142003.000|CC1|UNIFORM BE ASKED TO LIVE A LIE  
20101222142003.000|20101222142004.000|CC1|OR LOOK OVER THEIR SHOULDER IN  
20101222142004.000|20101222142007.000|CC1|ORDER TO SERVE THE COUNTRY THAT 
20101222142007.000|20101222142008.000|CC1|THEY LOVE.                      
20101222142008.000|20101222142018.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]                    
20101222142018.000|20101222142020.000|CC1|AS ADMIRAL MIKE MULLEN HAS      
20101222142020.000|20101222142022.000|CC1|SAID, OUR PEOPLE SACRIFICE A    
20101222142022.000|20101222142026.000|CC1|LOT FOR THEIR COUNTRY,

20101222142735.000|20101222142748.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]                    
20101222142748.000|20101222142750.000|CC1|NOW, WITH ANY CHANGE, THERE IS  
20101222142750.000|20101222142751.000|CC1|SOME APPREHENSION.

20101222142934.000|20101222142939.000|CC1|YOU HAVE BEEN ASK TO CARRY THE

20101222142947.000|20101222142949.000|CC1|OF CITIZENSHIP THAT ARE NOT     
20101222142949.000|20101222142950.000|CC1|FULLY GRANTED TO YOU.

20101222142953.000|20101222142954.000|CC1|CARRY THIS BURDEN.              
20101222142954.000|20101222142956.000|CC1|FOR WHILE TODAY MARKS END OF A  
20101222142956.000|20101222142958.000|CC1|PARTICULAR STRUGGLE THAT HAS    
20101222142958.000|20101222143000.000|CC1|LASTED ALMOST TWO DECADES, THIS 
20101222143000.000|20101222143001.000|CC1|IS A MOMENT MORE THAN TWO       
20101222143001.000|20101222143005.000|CC1|CENTURIES IN THE MAKING.        
20101222143005.000|20101222143006.000|CC1|THERE WILL NEVER BE A FULL      
20101222143006.000|20101222143009.000|CC1|ACCOUNTING OF THE HEROISM       
20101222143009.000|20101222143010.000|CC1|DEMONSTRATED BY GAY AMERICANS   
20101222143010.000|20101222143012.000|CC1|IN SERVICE TO THIS COUNTRY.     
20101222143012.000|20101222143014.000|CC1|THEIR SERVICE HAS BEEN OBSCURED 
20101222143014.000|20101222143015.000|CC1|IN HISTORY.                     
20101222143015.000|20101222143017.000|CC1|IT'S BEEN LOST TO PREJUDICE     
20101222143017.000|20101222143020.000|CC1|THAT HAVE WANED IN OUR OWN      
20101222143020.000|20101222143020.000|CC1|LIFETIMES.                      
20101222143020.000|20101222143022.000|CC1|BUT AT EVERY TURN, AT EVERY     
20101222143022.000|20101222143025.000|CC1|CROSSROADS IN OUR PAST, WE KNOW 
20101222143025.000|20101222143028.000|CC1|GAY AMERICANS FOUGHT JUST AS    
20101222143028.000|20101222143029.000|CC1|HARD, GAVE JUST AS MUCH, TO     
20101222143029.000|20101222143031.000|CC1|PROTECT THIS NATION AND THE     
20101222143031.000|20101222143035.000|CC1|IDEALS FOR WHICH IT STAND.      
20101222143035.000|20101222143036.000|CC1|THERE CAN BE LITTLE DOUBT THERE 
20101222143036.000|20101222143039.000|CC1|WERE GAY SOLDIERS WHO FOUGHT    
20101222143039.000|20101222143040.000|CC1|FOR AMERICAN  INDEPENDENCE, WHO 
20101222143040.000|20101222143043.000|CC1|CONSECRATED THE GROUND AT       
20101222143043.000|20101222143045.000|CC1|GETTYSBURG, WHO MANNED THE      
20101222143045.000|20101222143046.000|CC1|TRENCHES ALONG THE WESTERN      
20101222143046.000|20101222143050.000|CC1|FRONT, WHO STORMED THE BEACHES  
20101222143050.000|20101222143051.000|CC1|OF IWO JIMA.                    
20101222143051.000|20101222143052.000|CC1|THEIR NAMES ARE ETCHED IN THE   
20101222143052.000|20101222143057.000|CC1|WALLS OF OUR MEMORIALS.         
20101222143057.000|20101222143059.000|CC1|THEIR HEAD STONES DOT THE       
20101222143059.000|20101222143101.000|CC1|GROUND AT ARLINGTON.            
20101222143101.000|20101222143105.000|CC1|AND SO AS THE FIRST GENERATION  
20101222143105.000|20101222143107.000|CC1|TO SERVE  OPENLY IN OUR ARMED   
20101222143107.000|20101222143110.000|CC1|FORCES, YOU WILL STAND FOR ALL  
20101222143110.000|20101222143112.000|CC1|THOSE WHO CAME BEFORE YOU AND   
20101222143112.000|20101222143115.000|CC1|YOU WILL SERVE AS ROLE MODELS   
20101222143115.000|20101222143116.000|CC1|TO ALL WHO COME AFTER.          
20101222143116.000|20101222143120.000|CC1|I KNOW THAT YOU WILL FULFILL    
20101222143120.000|20101222143122.000|CC1|THIS RESPONSIBILITY WITH        
20101222143122.000|20101222143124.000|CC1|INTEGRITY AND HONOR, JUST AS    
20101222143124.000|20101222143125.000|CC1|YOU HAVE EVERY OTHER MISSION    
20101222143125.000|20101222143126.000|CC1|WITH WHICH YOU HAVE BEEN        
20101222143126.000|20101222143128.000|CC1|CHARGED.                        
20101222143128.000|20101222143131.000|CC1|AND YOU NEED TO LOOK NO FURTHER 
20101222143131.000|20101222143133.000|CC1|THAN THE SERVICEMEN AND WOMEN   
20101222143133.000|20101222143135.000|CC1|IN THIS ROOM, DISTINGUISHED     
20101222143135.000|20101222143138.000|CC1|OFFICERS LIKE FORMER NAVY       
20101222143138.000|20101222143139.000|CC1|COMMANDER ZOE DUNNING.          
20101222143139.000|20101222143156.000|CC1|[ CHEERS AND APPLAUSE ]         
20101222143156.000|20101222143158.000|CC1|MARINES LIKE ERIC, ONE OF THE   
20101222143158.000|20101222143159.000|CC1|FIRST AMERICANS IN IRAQ.        
20101222143159.000|20101222143214.000|CC1|[ CHEERS AND APPLAUSE ]         
20101222143214.000|20101222143216.000|CC1|LEADERS LIKE CAPTAIN JONATHAN   
20101222143216.000|20101222143220.000|CC1|HOPKINS WHO LED A PLATOON INTO
